main event: A high school student reported observing an unidentified flying object moving at high speed over Millheim, Pennsylvania, in 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed alongside three other companions,It was compared in size to a half-dollar at arm's length,The sighting lasted approximately 60 seconds before the object disappeared suddenly,No noise or exhaust was reported during the sighting,The weather was clear with 15-mile visibility during the observation.
